trans-unit.source: Hostnames — Ensure that all systems have properly configured hostnames. The hostname for the Chef Infra Server must be a FQDN, have fewer than 64 characters including the domain suffix, be lowercase, and resolvable. See Hostnames, FQDNs for more information

trans-unit.target: 主机名-确保所有系统都有正确配置的主机名。Chef Infra Server的主机名必须是FQDN，少于64个字符，包括域后缀，小写且可解析。有关更多信息，请参见主机名，FQDN。

trans-unit.source: Hostnames — Ensure that all systems have properly configured hostnames. The hostname for the Chef server must be a FQDN, including the domain suffix, and must be resolvable. See Hostnames, FQDNs for more information

trans-unit.source: Log files If /var/log/opscode is taking up a lot of disk space, ensure that the Chef Infra Server log rotation cron job is running without errors. These errors can be found in /var/log/messages, /var/log/syslog and/or the root user’s local mail.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件如果 /var/log/opscode 占用大量磁盘空间，请确保Chef Infra Server日志循环cron作业正在运行且没有错误。这些错误可以在 /var/log/messages ， /var/log/syslog 和/或root用户的本地邮件中找到。

trans-unit.source: Log files If /var/log/opscode is taking up a lot of disk space, ensure that the Chef server log rotation cron job is running without errors. These errors can be found in /var/log/messages, /var/log/syslog and/or the root user’s local mail.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件如果 /var/log/opscode 占用大量磁盘空间，请确保Chef服务器日志循环 cron作业正在运行且没有错误。这些错误可以在 /var/log/messages ， /var/log/syslog 和/或root用户的本地邮件中找到。

Manually specify the hostname and IP address:

Migrate—If a migration is to be run, the chef-client symlinks the database configuration file into the checkout (config/database.yml by default) and runs the migration command. For a Ruby on Rails application, the migration_command is usually set to rake db:migrate.
trans-unit.target: 迁移-如果要运行迁移，则Chef-client将数据库配置文件符号链接到签出（默认情况下为 config/database.yml ）并运行迁移命令。对于Ruby on Rails应用程序，通常将 migration_command 设置为 rake db:migrate 。

Mount and add to the file systems table

NOTE: Starting with the chef-client 12.6 release, this requirement applies only for versions of Windows PowerShell earlier than 5.0.10586.0. The latest version of Windows Management Framework (WMF) 5 has relaxed the limitation that prevented the chef-client from running in non-disabled refresh mode, which allows the Local Configuration Manager to be set to Push.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从chef-client 12.6版本开始，此要求仅适用于5.0.10586.0之前的Windows PowerShell版本。最新版本的Windows Management Framework（WMF）5放宽了限制，使厨师客户端无法在非禁用刷新模式下运行，该限制允许将本地配置管理器设置为 Push 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Starting with the chef-client 12.6 release, this requirement applies only for versions of Windows PowerShell earlier than 5.0.10586.0. The latest version of Windows Management Framework (WMF) 5 has relaxed the limitation that prevented the chef-client from running in non-disabled refresh mode.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从chef-client 12.6版本开始，此要求仅适用于5.0.10586.0之前的Windows PowerShell版本。Windows Management Framework（WMF）5的最新版本已放宽了限制，使厨师客户端无法以非禁用刷新模式运行。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: If you are in a physical space – e.g. Chef Conf, Meetup, etc. – please see the Physical Spaces Code of Conduct.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您在物理空间中，例如Conf厨师，Meetup等，请参阅《物理空间行为准则》。

trans-unit.source: NTP — Ensure that every server is connected to NTP; the Chef Infra Server is sensitive to clock drift
trans-unit.target: NTP-确保每个服务器都已连接到NTP；Chef Infra Server对时钟漂移很敏感

trans-unit.source: NTP — Ensure that every server is connected to NTP; the Chef server is sensitive to clock drift
trans-unit.target: NTP-确保每个服务器都已连接到NTP；Chef服务器对时钟漂移很敏感

trans-unit.source: New in 14.2 Use ssh-agent to authenticate. When using this option, specify the location of the public key in client_key. Default value: false. Ensure the public key is in PKCS#1 format. You can convert an OpenSSH public key using ssh-keygen. For example:
trans-unit.target: 14.2中的新增功能使用 ssh-agent 进行身份验证。使用此选项时，请在 client_key 中指定公钥的位置。默认值： false 。确保公钥为PKCS＃1格式。您可以使用 ssh-keygen 转换OpenSSH公钥。例如：

trans-unit.source: New in Chef Infra Server 13.1.13: Chef Infra Server 13.1.13 introduces the ability to encrypt traffic between Chef Infra Server and an external PostgreSQL server over SSL. These instructions are not all-encompassing and assume some familiarity with PostgreSQL administration, configuration, and troubleshooting. Consult the PostgreSQL documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 13.1.13中的新增功能： Chef Infra Server 13.1.13引入了通过SSL加密Chef Infra Server与外部PostgreSQL服务器之间的通信的功能。这些说明并不全面，并且假定您对PostgreSQL的管理，配置和故障排除有所了解。有关更多信息，请查阅PostgreSQL文档。

trans-unit.source: New in Chef Infra Server 14 Starting with Chef Infra Server 14, standalone instances use Elasticsearch for internal search. Elasticsearch provides more flexible clustering options while maintaining search API compatibility with Apache Solr.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 14的新增功能从Chef Infra Server 14开始，独立实例使用Elasticsearch进行内部搜索。Elasticsearch提供了更灵活的集群选项，同时保持了搜索API与Apache Solr的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: New in Chef Server 12.14: Chef Infra Server limits where it writes service passwords and keys to disk. In the default configuration, credentials are only written to files in /etc/opscode.
trans-unit.target: Chef Server 12.14中的新增功能： Chef Infra Server限制了它将服务密码和密钥写入磁盘的位置。在默认配置中，凭据仅写入 /etc/opscode 中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Normal attribute set as a cookbook attribute

Note: If you are using a container scheduler such as the Kubernetes kube-scheduler, Docker Swarm mode, Mesos DC/OS’s Marathon or Chronos, or a PaaS such as Cloud Foundry, you should not follow the bastion ring pattern, because the scheduler handles persistence and orchestration on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您使用的是容器调度程序，例如Kubernetes kube-scheduler ，Docker Swarm模式，Mesos DC / OS的Marathon或Chronos或PaaS（例如Cloud Foundry），则不应遵循堡垒环模式，因为调度程序会处理坚持与编排代表您。

trans-unit.source: Note: Incidents that violate the Community Code of Conduct are extremely damaging to the community. The silver lining is that, in many cases, these incidents present a chance for the community as a whole to grow, learn, and become better.
trans-unit.target: 注意：违反社区行为准则的事件会对社区造成极大损害。一线希望是，在许多情况下，这些事件为整个社区提供了成长，学习和变得更好的机会。

trans-unit.source: Note: This step only applies to self-signed SSL certificates. If you are using an SSL certificate signed by a valid certificate authority, you may skip this step.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此步骤仅适用于自签名SSL证书。如果您使用由有效证书颁发机构签名的SSL证书，则可以跳过此步骤。

trans-unit.source: Note: When running private packages from Builder, it’s necessary to add your Chef Habitat access token to the machine where you intend to deploy the package, via export HAB_AUTH_TOKEN=<token>.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Builder运行私有软件包时，有必要通过 export HAB_AUTH_TOKEN=<token> 将Chef Habitat访问令牌添加到要部署该软件包的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Note: You are viewing documentation for an older version of Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您正在查看旧版本的Chef Infra Server的文档。

trans-unit.source: Note Custom channels like test are scoped to each package. Builder does not create channels scoped to an origin, so if you want to use custom channels for future releases of a package, you must promote to those channels for each release.
trans-unit.target: 注意诸如 test 之类的自定义渠道适用于每个程序包。Builder不会创建范围限定于原始位置的通道，因此，如果要在软件包的将来版本中使用自定义通道，则必须针对每个版本升级到那些通道。

trans-unit.source: Note If you demote a package from the stable channel, then any other packages that depend on the stable version of that package will either fail to load or build depending on how that demoted packaged was used.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您从 stable 通道降级了软件包，则依赖于该软件包稳定版本的任何其他软件包都将无法加载或生成，具体取决于所使用降级软件包的方式。

trans-unit.source: Note If you specify an origin/package identifier, such as core/postgresql, the Chef Habitat CLI will check Builder for the latest stable version of the package and export that.
trans-unit.target: 注意如果您指定了 origin/package 标识符，例如 core/postgresql ，Chef Habitat CLI将在Builder中检查软件包的最新稳定版本并将其导出。

trans-unit.source: Note In a Windows container studio, the export command will not be able to access the host docker engine. To export a Windows package or hart file built inside of a Windows container studio, first exit the studio and then export the .hart file in your local results directory.
trans-unit.target: 注意在Windows容器工作室中， export 命令将无法访问主机docker引擎。要导出Windows容器工作室中内置的Windows包或hart文件，请先退出工作室，然后将 .hart 文件导出到本地 results 目录中。

trans-unit.source: Note On Linux, exporting your Chef Habitat artifact to a Docker image requires the Docker Engine supplied by Docker. Packages from distribution-specific or otherwise alternative providers are currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: 注意在Linux上，将Chef Habitat工件导出到Docker映像需要Docker提供的Docker Engine。当前不支持特定于发行版或其他替代提供程序的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Note The command above is for local testing only. If you have uploaded your package to Builder, you can export it by calling hab pkg export docker origin/package. The default is to use the latest stable release; however, you can override that by specifying a different channel in an optional flag.
trans-unit.target: 注意上面的命令仅用于本地测试。如果您已将软件包上载到Builder，则可以通过调用 hab pkg export docker origin/package 来导出它。默认为使用最新的稳定版本；但是，您可以通过在可选标志中指定其他频道来覆盖该频道。

trans-unit.source: Note To generate this image, a base Docker image is also created. The Cloud Foundry version of the docker image will have cf- as a prefix in the image tag.
trans-unit.target: 注意：要生成此映像，还将创建一个基本的Docker映像。Docker映像的Cloud Foundry版本将在映像标签中以 cf- 作为前缀。

trans-unit.source: Note You can also promote packages to the stable channel using the promote to stable button in the web app.
trans-unit.target: 注意您还可以使用Web应用程序中的“提升到稳定”按钮将软件包提升到 stable 频道。

trans-unit.source: Note: While all parameters are optional, at least one must be provided. In practice, the more parameters you provide the narrower a result you will return.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管所有参数都是可选的，但必须至少提供一个。实际上，您提供的参数越多，返回的结果越窄。

trans-unit.source: Note: Any leadership repair process is a very dangerous step that can result in data loss. We recommend opening a ticket with Support to go over any cluster leadership issue.
trans-unit.target: 注意：任何领导力修复过程都是非常危险的步骤，可能会导致数据丢失。我们建议您与支持部门联系以解决所有集群领导问题。

trans-unit.source: Note: Habitat will put the uplodaded file in your service’s svc/files directory.
trans-unit.target: 注意：人居会将升级后的文件放在服务的 svc/files 目录中。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you are in a physical space (e.g. ChefConf, Meetup, etc), please see the Physical Spaces Code of Conduct.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您在物理空间（例如ChefConf，Meetup等）中，请参阅《物理空间行为准则》。

trans-unit.source: Note: The default listening port on the Supervisor is 9631; however, you can change the listening port by using the --listen-http option when starting a service.
trans-unit.target: 注意：Supervisor的默认侦听端口为9631；默认侦听端口为9631。但是，您可以在启动服务时使用 --listen-http 选项来更改侦听端口。

trans-unit.source: Note: This is primarily for accessing remote files when the user that Chef Infra Client is running as does not have sufficient access, and alternative credentials need to be specified. If the user already has access, the credentials do not need to be specified. In a case where the local system and remote system are in the same domain, the remote_user and remote_password properties often do not need to be specified, as the user may already have access to the remote file share.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这主要用于访问运行Chef Infra Client的用户没有足够的访问权限，并且需要指定备用凭据时访问远程文件。如果用户已经具有访问权限，则无需指定凭据。在本地系统和远程系统位于同一域中的情况下，通常不需要指定 remote_user 和 remote_password 属性，因为用户可能已经可以访问远程文件共享。

trans-unit.source: Note: This only removes the sysctl.d config for kernel.msgmax. The value will be set back to the kernel default value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这只会删除kernel.msgmax的sysctl.d配置。该值将重新设置为内核默认值。

trans-unit.source: On Linux systems, copy the certificate to/hab/cache/ssl if you are the root user, or to ~/.hab/cache/ssl if you are a non-root user. If you are a non-root user, the full file path is /Users/username/.hab/cache/ssl/automate.cert, located in your local user’s home directory. Non-root users may need to use sudo with the command. For example, as the root user, copy the file with:
trans-unit.target: 在Linux系统上，如果您是root用户，请将证书复制到 /hab/cache/ssl ,如果您不是root用户，则将证书复制到 ~/.hab/cache/ssl 。如果您是非root用户，则完整文件路径为 /Users/username/.hab/cache/ssl/automate.cert ，位于本地用户的主目录中。非root用户可能需要在命令中使用 sudo 。例如，以root用户身份使用以下命令复制文件：

trans-unit.source: On Windows systems, store your certs in C:\hab\cache\ssl. For example, copy the file with:
trans-unit.target: 在Windows系统上，将证书存储在 C:\hab\cache\ssl 。例如，使用以下命令复制文件：

trans-unit.source: One liner to install profile from cookbook file
trans-unit.target: 一根衬纸从食谱文件安装配置文件

trans-unit.source: One note on Linux nodes: The shutdown command blocks (as opposed to the Windows variant which registers the reboot and returns right away), so once the timeout period passes, Chef Infra Client and the node are in a race to see who can exit/shutdown first - so you may or may not get the exit code out of Linux instances. In that case, you can add 1 to the retry_on_exit_code array and that should catch both cases.
trans-unit.target: 关于Linux节点的一个注意事项：shutdown命令会阻止（与Windows变种相反，该变种会注册重新启动并立即返回），因此一旦超时时间过去，Chef Infra Client和该节点将争夺谁可以退出/首先关闭-因此您可能会也可能不会从Linux实例中获得退出代码。在这种情况下，您可以将 1 加到 retry_on_exit_code 数组中，这将同时满足这两种情况。

trans-unit.source: Optional: Set the default shell. On Microsoft Windows it is strongly recommended to use Windows PowerShell instead of cmd.exe.
trans-unit.target: 可选：设置默认外壳。在Microsoft Windows上，强烈建议使用Windows PowerShell代替 cmd.exe 。

trans-unit.source: Provision. Provision infrastructure needed to test the artifact(s). Examples include instantiating new infrastructure with and manipulating Chef Infra Server environments to designate the nodes used by the current stage. Of course, what executes in any phase is up to you and determined by the project’s build cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 规定。设置测试工件所需的基础架构。示例包括使用Chef Infra Server环境实例化新基础结构并操纵Chef Infra Server环境以指定当前阶段使用的节点。当然，在任何阶段执行的操作都由您决定，并由项目的构建指南决定。

trans-unit.source: Publish. The goal of the publish phase is to produce the potentially releasable artifacts and to make them available to the rest of the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 发布。发布阶段的目标是产生可能释放的工件，并使它们可用于管道的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: Quality. A place to run additional test suites and code analysis tools. Some tests are too time consuming to run in Verify and are better reserved for changes that have received approval.
trans-unit.target: 品质。一个运行其他测试套件和代码分析工具的地方。有些测试太耗时，无法在“验证”中运行，因此最好保留给已获批准的更改。

trans-unit.source: RabbitMQ The RabbitMQ data folder can fill up if the opscode-expander service is not able to keep up with the data being moved into the search database by RabbitMQ. When the opscode-expander service falls behind, RabbitMQ will start storing the individual messages on-disk while it waits for the opscode-expander service to catch up. If the RabbitMQ disk fills up completely, RabbitMQ will need to be restarted to free up the disk space and any data that was stored on-disk will be lost.
trans-unit.target: RabbitMQ如果opscode-expander服务无法跟上RabbitMQ移入搜索数据库的数据，则RabbitMQ数据文件夹可以填满。当opscode-expander服务落后时，RabbitMQ将在等待opscode-expander服务赶上的同时开始将各个消息存储在磁盘上。如果RabbitMQ磁盘完全装满，则需要重新启动RabbitMQ释放磁盘空间，并且磁盘上存储的所有数据都将丢失。

trans-unit.source: SAML config migration: Chef Automate 2 supports SAML integration, however due to configuration incompatibilities Chef Automate 2 cannot migrate Chef Automate 1 SAML settings to Chef Automate 2 as part of the upgrade. After the upgrade is completed, you may follow these configuration instructions to set up SAML.
trans-unit.target: SAML配置迁移： Chef Automate 2支持SAML集成，但是由于配置不兼容，Chef Automate 2无法在升级过程中将Chef Automate 1 SAML设置迁移到Chef Automate 2。升级完成后，您可以按照以下配置说明来设置SAML。

trans-unit.source: Security. In many organizations, a suite of security tests must be run before a change can be deployed. The Build phase is the place to run such scans and checks. (You can also add compliance checks into the functional test suites that run against the deployed artifacts.)
trans-unit.target: 安全性。在许多组织中，必须先运行一套安全测试，然后才能部署更改。构建阶段是运行此类扫描和检查的地方。（您还可以将合规性检查添加到针对已部署工件运行的功能测试套件中。）

trans-unit.source: Sudo requires a credential name, a user name, and a password or sudo options, but not both.

trans-unit.source: Symlink—Directories for shared and temporary files are removed from the checkout (log, tmp/pids, and public/system by default). After this step, any needed directories (tmp, public, and config by default) are created if they don’t already exist. This step is completed by symlinking shared directories into the current release, public/system, tmp/pids, and log directories, and then symlinking the release directory to current.
trans-unit.target: 符号链接 -共享文件和临时文件的目录已从签出中删除（默认情况下为 log ， tmp/pids 和 public/system ）。完成此步骤后，将创建所有所需的目录（默认情况下为 tmp ， public 和 config ）。通过将共享目录符号链接到当前 release ， public/system ， tmp/pids 和 log 目录，然后将 release 目录符号链接到 current ，可以完成此步骤。
